original_title: Experiments in Advertising: The Films of Erwin Blumenfeld: Advertising & Layout
overview: Part of a triptych of fashion films edited from Erwin Blumenfeld's original footage by filmmaker Adam Mufti and sound designer Olivier Alary. This film examines the concept of 'Adertising & Layout' in Blumenfeld's motion image work.
title: Experiments in Advertising: The Films of Erwin Blumenfeld: Advertising & Layout
